name: Endless Drifting Arena
description:
A creative driving and drifting game!

Get on and make the fastest drift! There is no brakes and all that stands between you and death is your ability to drift.

Drift and drive as long as you can! Dodge the obstacles and collect the stars. Using your skill to drift at crazy angles!

Game Features:

- Easy screen tapping controls allows anyone to perform cool drifting!
- Amazing Racing Experience
- Absolutely stunning 3D environment
- Amazing realistic car physics

Can you drift to survive? Let's go!
